Package items

Class PlayerInventory

java.lang.Object
items.Inventory
items.PlayerInventory
public class PlayerInventory extends Inventory
The PlayerInventory class represents the player's inventory, including the hotbar and selected item functionalities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlayerInventory()
    Constructs a PlayerInventory with default rows and columns.
